title: Delay in departure Maryam due to illness of PML-N worker: Marriyum
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jan 28 (APP): Minister for Information and Broadcasting Marriyum Aurangzeb said on Saturday that the reason for the delay in the departure of the plane of Pakistan Muslim League-Nawaz Senior Vice President Maryam Nawaz from  was the sudden illness of a  Muslim League (N) worker on board.
In a tweet, she said that the worker had been sent for immediate medical assistance.
“Now the flight is ready to take off. Inshallah, Maryam Nawaz will be in Lahore in a few hours”, she said.
